ClassDesc: Use the A @B_android#preference#Preference_E@ that allows for string input. It is a subclass of @B_android#preference#DialogPreference_E@ and shows the @B_android#widget#EditText_E@ in a dialog. This @B_android#widget#EditText_E@ can be modified either programmatically via @B_android#preference#EditTextPreference#getEditText_E@, or through XML by setting any EditText attributes on the EditTextPreference. This preference will store a string into the SharedPreferences. See @B_android#R#styleable#EditText_E@.
